source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a wide scenery shot. The scene opens with a low-angle view, framing the large dome of a basilica in the top-left and center of the frame against a cloudy sky in the top-right background. The camera then simultaneously tilts down and trucks to the left. This movement reveals the full facade of the basilica, which occupies the left and center middle ground, and a wide staircase leading down from it. The camera angle becomes more level relative to the base of the basilica, and the slow, continuous trucking motion to the left persists throughout the clip.

Return only the one-paragraph video description without Markdown formatting or introductory text.

The camera is slowly moving to the left, suggesting it is traveling along the canal.**

The grand, white stone church features an ornate facade with numerous statues, columns, and a large, dark arched door, all beneath a massive grey dome. A wide set of stone steps descends from the basilica's entrance to the edge of the murky green water. In the foreground, several dark blue gondolas are moored to wooden poles. To the right of the main church, a simpler building with a red-tiled roof is visible. The perspective slowly trucks left, revealing more of the steps and the boats at the water's edge, where a few people are seen walking.**

Please note that the video is a **scenery shot**. You do not need to describe the subjects. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
